Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a three-run home run in the ninth inning to put the Mets ahead 3-2
Pre-Game Insights: Mets manager Carlos Mendoza predicted the big hit was coming for Alonso in his postgame interview after the Metsâ€™ Game 2 loss.
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets showed why. Their tenacity and inability to surrender carried them over the Brewers when everybody thought they were down.
Mets get to taste the champagne again. They also get to host a postseason game in Queens.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers had the best bullpen in the NL but couldn't finish the job despite having a two-run lead with their closer in the game.
